channel.description: Homepage powered by Long Haul, a Jekyll theme built with SASS

item.title: New PhD student
item.description: Iam looking for a new PhD student to work on extending the applicability of verification to Reinforcement learning. See here for more information about the project. We will soon announce the position. Contact me if you have questions.

Iam looking for a new PhD student to work on extending the applicability of verification to Reinforcement learning. See here for more information about the project. We will soon announce the position. Contact me if you have questions.

item.title: Co-Chair of the E1 Topic at DATE 2024
item.description: Co-chair of the "Embedded Software Architecture, Compilers and Tool Chains" topic of the "Embedded Systems Design" track of DATE 2024.

item.title: Paper at ICASSP
item.description: Paper Safe Deep: A Scalable Robustness Verification Framework for Deep Neural Networks with Anahita Baninajjar, Kamran Hosseini and Amir Aminifar accepted at ICASSP 2023-2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing.

item.title: PhD defence
item.description: Congratulation to Adrian Horga for defending his PhD thesis about Performance and Security Analysis for GPU-Based Applications.

item.title: Article at Journal of System Architecture
item.description: Article Symbolic identification of shared memory based bank conflicts for GPUs with Adrian Horga, Sudipta Chattopadhyay, Petru Eles and Zebo Peng accepted at Journal of Systems Architecture.
Article Symbolic identification of shared memory based bank conflicts for GPUs with Adrian Horga, Sudipta Chattopadhyay, Petru Eles and Zebo Peng accepted at Journal of Systems Architecture.
